code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"../styles/votecount.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function VoteCount(){const[votes,setVotes]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const fetchVoteCount=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/candidate/vote/count",{headers:{"Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}});const data=await res.json();if(res.ok){setVotes(data);}else{setError(data.message||"Failed to load vote count");}}catch(err){setError("Server not reachable");}};fetchVoteCount();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"vote-count-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"page-heading",children:"Vote Count"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-text",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"vote-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Party"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Votes"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:votes.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.party}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.count})]},index))})]})]});}export default VoteCount;
